rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了塞姆利基森林病毒进入大脑的途径在最近的一项研究中，乌普萨拉大学的研究人员表明，塞姆利基森林病毒首先进入脑脊液，然后与特定的细胞类型结合，然后再深入大脑，从而进入中枢神经系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-route-of-entry-for-Semliki-Forest-virus-into-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-route-of-entry-for-Semliki-Forest-virus-into-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b77e71f9-da70-4e8e-bf08-ae0b932fe882 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 14:26:36 -0500 Study reveals route of entry for Semliki Forest virus into the brain
美国痴呆症病例预计将随着人口老龄化而激增一项新研究表明，美国人 55 岁以后患痴呆症的风险为 42%，是之前研究报告风险的两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/US-dementia-cases-expected-to-surge-with-aging-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/US-dementia-cases-expected-to-surge-with-aging-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19989857-ddd8-497d-9e39-bd6bfbd93c20 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 14:12:00 -0500 U.S. dementia cases expected to surge with aging population
长读取可以彻底改变罕见疾病的基因诊断罕见疾病的病因越来越多地通过基因组测序来检测，基因组测序涉及通过首先将其分成小片段（短读段）来读取整个人类 DNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Long-reads-can-revolutionize-genic-diagnosis-of-rare-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Long-reads-can-revolutionize-genic-diagnosis-of-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ae1fcba-a7dc-4956-97d5-ba5d19db6fd9 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 14:08:31 -0500 Long reads can revolutionize genetic diagnosis of rare diseases
CeVD 相关的大脑网络表型可以提供对认知衰退轨迹的见解研究人员发现了关于与脑血管疾病（CeVD）相关的大脑功能中断如何与阿尔茨海默病（AD）病理相互作用，从而影响老年人的神经退行性变和认知的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/CeVD-lated-brain-network-phenotype-can-provide-insights-into-cognitive-decline-trajectory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/CeVD-lated-brain-network-phenotype-can-provide-insights-into-cognitive-decline-trajectory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0033d964-91e8-4198-9127-65195ad3497b Mon, 13 Jan 2025 13:55:40 -0500 CeVD-related brain network phenotype can provide insights into cognitive decline trajectory
基因发现推动治疗脑血管畸形的新方法脑血管畸形（CVM），包括脑动静脉畸形（AVM）和海绵状血管畸形（CCM），由于其复杂的起源和严重的临床影响，长期以来一直面临着挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Genetic-discoveries-drive-new-approaches-to-treating-cerebral-angio-malformations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Genetic-discoveries-drive-new-approaches-to-treating-cerebral-angio-malformations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a199ba9-4846-4672-8458-c94c996d043d Mon, 13 Jan 2025 13:41:26 -0500 Genetic discoveries drive new approaches to treating cerebral vascular malformations
NFL 球员只开出很少的阿片类药物来缓解疼痛由于职业的身体接触性质，美国国家橄榄球联盟 (NFL) 的精英运动员经常会感到疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/NFL-players-prescribed-very-few-opioids-for-pain-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/NFL-players-prescribed-very-few-opioids-for-pain-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96e17651-b5ac-4e84-9e73-68dd7be2ab29 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 13:26:10 -0500 NFL players prescribed very few opioids for pain management
开发人工智能聊天机器人以帮助政府应对耐药性科学家们开发了一种类似于 ChatGPT 的人工智能聊天机器人，以帮助政府制定有效的政策来对抗耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/AI-Chatbot-Deployed-To-Target-Drug-Resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/AI-Chatbot-Deployed-To-Target-Drug-Resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58309a3b-9392-40e3-a383-c30a3b431eb7 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:58:00 -0500 AI chatbot developed to aid governments in tackling drug resistance
炎性体保护干细胞免于癌变根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的一项临床前研究，一组称为炎性体的免疫蛋白可以通过去除血液干细胞表面的某些受体并阻断癌症基因活性来帮助防止血液干细胞恶性化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Inflammasome-protects-stem-cells-from-becoming-cancerous.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Inflammasome-protects-stem-cells-from-becoming-cancerous.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5217e5a-be1f-49d2-87be-537c1ba18b52 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:49:54 -0500 Inflammasome protects stem cells from becoming cancerous
研究揭示寨卡病毒如何劫持宿主蛋白进行繁殖众所周知，蚊子传播的寨卡病毒会引起小头畸形，这是一种先天缺陷，大脑发育异常导致头部小于预期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-how-Zika-virus-hijacks-host- Protein-for-reproduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-how-Zika-virus-hijacks-host- Protein-for-reproduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41342f24-bb80-4bb3-baec-651c16d51f0c Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:34:00 -0500 Study reveals how Zika virus hijacks host protein for reproduction
新研究揭示了肝癌趋势的变化肝癌是全世界癌症相关死亡的主要原因，其发病率具有不同的地理模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-research-sheds-light-on-changing-liver-cancer-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-research-sheds-light-on-changing-liver-cancer-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ef71f57-d15c-4c49-805e-b41038f7a1e9 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:23:07 -0500 New research sheds light on changing liver cancer trends
